caption.center: GEORGE, INC. v. JOHN H. NORBERG, TAX ADMINISTRATOR.

opinion.posture:
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.
Mr. Justice Doris did not participate.
opinion.attorneys:
Gorham Gorham, John Gorham, Edmund L. Alves, Jr., for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Attorney General, William G. Brody, Assistant Attorney General, Perry Shatkin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), for respondent.
